attributes.comment:
I find it absolutley unbelieveble that with all the suffering going on with the children
of the world that we, and by we I mean the governments think it's okay to
continually make it harder and harder for good and stable citizens of our world to
adopt. So often the government does nothing to help the suffering children and
when a good person steps up to help a child the government makes it harder
instead of easier by putting up so many road blocks like this one. You make it
nearly impossible for someone to be able to help a child. I think its disgusting
that you put the almighty dollar over the health and well being of a child as if ther
could ever be a price or dollar value put on a human being although you seem to
have done that. It's time to stop putting money before humans and I beg you to
reconsider what you're doing to these wonderful people who want more than to
give love and support and the promise of a future to a child.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lenda Van Lehn
